column1: * Gandalf visits Bag End but Bilbo Baggins is missing. He talks with Holman Greenhand and realises Bilbo is the right person for the Quest for Erebor.
* Thorin and Gandalf visit Bilbo Baggins in the Shire.
* Bilbo meets Sméagol/Gollum and finds the One Ring.
* Saruman agrees to an Attack on Dol Guldur
column2: since he now wishes to prevent Sauron from searching the Anduin.

column1: * Sauron having made his plans abandons Dol Guldur.
* The Battle of Five Armies in Dale.
* Dáin Ironfoot of the Iron Hills becomes King under the Mountain.

column2: first child and son of Holman Cotton.

column1: For one calculation of dates during this year see:
*http://lalaith.vpsurf.de/Tolkien/2941.html A daily calendar of 2941 TA by Andreas Moehn
